headline.main: Nigeria Warns: Don't Travel to US, Valid Visa Holders Barred
headline.print_headline: Nigeria Warns: Don't Travel to US, Valid Visa Holders Barred

lead_paragraph: Nigeria warned citizens Monday not to travel to the United States unless it's urgent, saying some Nigerians with valid U.S. visas have been refused entry.
snippet: Nigeria warned citizens Monday not to travel to the United States unless it's urgent, saying some Nigerians with valid U.S. visas have been refused entry....
